blogPost.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
blogPost.body: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
blogPost.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp
blogPost.author: Petr Filipchyk

localize.description: TeamTime是专门为https://basecamp.com 用户设计的最简单、最精简、最安全的时间记录工具（移动和网络）。我们在与其他工具斗争后，为https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 创建了它。我们把它与你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的团队的时间跟踪

localize.description: TeamTime是專門爲https://basecamp.com 用戶設計的最簡單、最精簡、最安全的時間記錄工具（移動和網絡）。我們在與其他工具鬥爭後，爲https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves 創建了它。我們把它與你分享。
localize.tagline: 使用Basecamp的團隊的時間跟蹤

previous.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
previous.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse

localize.description: 你关注谁是会所应用最重要的方面之一。显示给用户的房间是基于你选择关注的人和俱乐部。我整理了一份名单，列出了200个在Clubhouse上最有影响力的人。
你關注誰是會所應用最重要的方面之一。顯示給用戶的房間是基於你選擇關注的人和俱樂部。我整理了一份名單，列出了200個在Clubhouse上最有影響力的人。

next.excerpt: pNeura is a platform that enables entrepreneurs to share their progress and connect with other entrepreneurs and investors. Investors can follow their portfolios with ease. Developed by Appello Software.
next.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS

localize.description: pNeura是一个让创业者能够分享他们的进展并与其他创业者和投资者联系的平台。投资者可以轻松地跟踪他们的投资组合。由Appello软件公司开发。
localize.tagline: 探索创业公司和创始人

localize.description: pNeura是一個讓創業者能夠分享他們的進展並與其他創業者和投資者聯繫的平臺。投資者可以輕鬆地跟蹤他們的投資組合。由Appello軟件公司開發。
localize.tagline: 探索創業公司和創始人
